Comments: 4th Canadian Armoured Division Moves through Caen to Enter the line
Replace Lincoln and Welling Regiment. Heavy Mortar and Sniper Fire
Out of the front line for a few hours for Beer and Bath Parades.
Op Totalize. Battalion left at 0130 on Carriers. Capture Cintheaux 15 miles south of Caen. Heavy bombing preceded attack.
OP Tractable. 800 bombers precede attack. $th Armoured Bgd moves forward 7 miles, clearing Rouvres, Olendon and capturing Perrieres
Leading the Eastern prong of the attack. Working to close the Falaise Gap.
Continuing to close the Falaise Gap.

B and C coy with South Alberta Armoured Regiment. St Lambert sur Dives was the last escape route for the Germans. The Battle group held despite heavy losses and repeated attacks and finally closed the Gap. Maj Currie won the VC for his actions. Last conflict in the battle of Normandy
George Joins the Argylls D Company
Several soldiers captured including George - Total causualties 300 75% of the Battalion fighting strength.
Counter Attack repelled. Assault on Osterscheps
Reinforcements Received. All 4 companies at 90 men.
Berlin Brigade raise Union Jack over Berlin
14 Officers and 235 OR to Berlin Brigade
Berlin Brigade raise Union Jack over Berlin Victory Parade - Churchill Montgomery
Parade honouring losses in Bergern Op Zoom
